name: BolivarCoin
0:
”Alexa open Bolivar Coin”
”Alexa ask Bolivar Coin the price”
”Alexa ask Bolivar Coin the price of 25 bolis”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bolivar coin
des: Alexa will tell you the price of Bolivarcoin in US dollars, satoshis and bolivares. Also the price of Bitcoin in US dollars, and the price of one dollar in bolivares.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
